text: Claude Gagnière (January 20, 1928 – September 12, 2003) was a French writer. He was born in Alès. He died in Paris. After he died he was awarded the prize of the Bouquinistes for all his work in 2004. ==Works== * All over all - Small dictionary of the unusual and of the smile, 1986 * To the happiness of the words, 1989 * Of words and wonders, 1994 * Between guillemets: small dictionary of appointments, 1996 * Versiculets & texticules: epigrams, madrigals, five centuries of fugitive poetries, 1999 * The fable express: of Alphonse Went to Boris Vian, 2002 Category:1928 births Category:2003 deaths Category:Writers from Occitanie Category:People from Gard
title: Claude Gagnière
